description:
In the virtual world, you can be anyone. And for Miracle, her dream is to be a famous virtual artist! Miracle attends ADEN Academy, where she learns new talents to prepare her for her big debut. Although she’s a bit of a klutz, she’s determined to follow in the footsteps of her idol: the legendary VTuber, Kizuna AI. With dedication and the help of her friends, her dream just might come true!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Cosmic Horror
tags.description: A type of horror that emphasizes human insignificance in the grand scope of cosmic reality; fearing the unknown and being powerless to fight it.

title.native: バーチャルYouTuber キズナアイ 公式コミックアンソロジー ~トモダチをつくろう編
絆のアリル セカンドシーズン

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/morikuraen) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/177784)

Character designer of Virtual YouTuber [Kizuna AI](https://anilist.co/character/206833).

[Website](http://hitodama.info/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/hitodama1103/)

A Japanese singer, songwriter, radio personality and scriptwriter.

She has released 17 singles and 11 albums since her debut as a 13-year-old in 1994. Several of her songs have been used as anime theme songs. She is often mistaken for a voice actress because she is in the same field of activity as idol-esque voice actresses. When she is working as a screenwriter, she goes by the name Deko Akao, an alias made up from her senior [Satoru Akahori](https://anilist.co/staff/97460/)'s name.

Mother of a son and twin daughters.
Facebook __Ryo Sasaki__ is a Japanese freelance CG director, 3D artist and producer.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明田川仁)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).

PathTLive, is an all-female Japanese band consisting of five members from the XR artist project "Alleles," made their major debut from Sony Music Labels and their debut song "mirAI wave!" is featured as the opening theme for the TV anime [Kizuna no Allele](https://anilist.co/anime/156896/Kizuna-no-Allele/).

(Source: Crunchyroll, edited)

Members: 
- [Ayumi Hinohara](https://anilist.co/staff/293315/Ayumi-Hinohara) as [Miracle](https://anilist.co/character/291947/Miracle)
- [Rina Kawaguchi](https://anilist.co/staff/227955/Rina-Kawaguchi) as [Quan](https://anilist.co/character/293316/Quan)
- [Hikari Kodama](https://anilist.co/staff/199405/Hikari-Kodama) as [Chris](https://anilist.co/character/293318/Chris)
- [Yuka Nukui](https://anilist.co/staff/126865/Yuka-Nukui) as [Noelle](https://anilist.co/character/293317/Noelle)
- [Arisa Hanawa](https://anilist.co/staff/293320/Arisa-Hanawa) as [Riz](https://anilist.co/character/293319/Riz)

__Height:__ 140.4 cm
__Illustrator:__ [En Morikura](https://anilist.co/staff/121973/En-Morikura)
__Character Concept Art:__ [Keigo Inoue](https://anilist.co/staff/244244/Keigo-Inoue)

__[Website](https://kizunaai.com/kzn/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/KZN_dayo)__

__#kzn__, known as Kizuna (キズナ), is a Japanese Song Voice developed by Kizuna AI Inc. based on the virtual YouTuber [Kizuna AI](https://anilist.co/staff/127742/Ai-Kizuna), and officially released for CeVIO AI in February 2023.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/531004994) | [Sakugabooru](https://www.sakugabooru.com/post?tags=shuu_sugita)

Originating from [Studio DEEN](https://anilist.co/studio/37/). Currently affiliated with [WIT Studio](https://anilist.co/studio/858).

streamingEpisodes.title: Episode 10 - ~What It Means to Be Me~
